titles.title: A bill to extend the temporary suspension of import duties on cantaloupes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S1035-1036)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 2/2/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend, through December 31, 1994, the suspension of duty on fresh cantaloupes entered into the United States during the period from January 1 to May 15, inclusive, in any year.
